channel.description: Recent content in Textbook on Leonardo Benicio

item.title: Algorithm Design
item.description: A practical approach to algorithm design with emphasis on design paradigms and proofs of correctness.

item.title: Algorithms
item.description: An accessible algorithms textbook with strong intuition and mathematical clarity.

item.title: Introduction to Algorithms (3rd ed.)
item.description: A comprehensive and rigorous textbook covering algorithms and data structures, widely used in CS curricula.
